typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pr_id as integer,
		url as string,
		value_hash as string,
		price as float,
		price_level as integer,
		area as float,
		area_level as integer,
		rooms as integer,
		toilets as integer,
		direction as integer,
		type as integer,
		cate as integer,
		city as string,
		distr as integer,
		ward_id as integer,
		street_id as integer,
		proj_id as integer,
		triggered_time as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
